What hardware do you use?

KVM -- 

Dual L5639
48 GB DDR3 ECC RAM
6 x 1 TB Hard Drives in RAID-10 

OpenVZ -- 

Dual L5639
36 GB DDR3 ECC RAM
4 x 1 TB Hard Drives in RAID-10 
 

Do you own your hardware and IP addresses?

Yes! We own all of our hardware outright, because of that we are able to pass the saving to our clients. All of our equipment is housed within a locking cage under lock and key. We own our IP addresses and hold direct allocations with ARIN. ASN - AS19757 
 

Do you have any Test IP's and Downloads?

You can go to our http://lg.nodeserv.com to utilize our looking glass for pings, traceroutes, and test files. 
 

Our servers are housed within GoRACK in Jacksonville, Florida.
